short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to synchronize youtube subtitle to Anki

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Youtube2anki is an open source tool for learning language by Youtube and Anki.
It allows you to quickly synchronize sentences of interest from YouTube subtitles to Anki cards.
Before using youtube2anki, you need to install the Anki-Connect Add-on.
